description: This file defines the IIPNetwork interface within the WPEFramework project, including nested DNS server management, for network configuration functionalities.

classes.name: IIPNetwork
classes.description: Interface for managing IP network addresses and DNS servers, with methods to add and remove addresses and DNS configurations, and nested interface IDNSServers.

classes.name: IDNSServers
classes.description: Nested interface for managing DNS server entries, including methods to reset the list, iterate through DNS entries, and retrieve the server address.

methods.name: AddAddress
methods.description: Adds a network address to the specified interface; overloaded to accept different parameter sets.

methods.name: RemoveAddress
methods.description: Removes a specified network address from the interface.

methods.name: AddDNS
methods.description: Adds DNS server entries via the IDNSServers interface.

methods.name: RemoveDNS
methods.description: Removes DNS server entries via the IDNSServers interface.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets the DNS server list in IDNSServers.

methods.name: Next
methods.description: Iterates to the next DNS server in the list.

ctags.name: IDNSServers
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IDNSServers : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IIPNetwork
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IIPNetwork : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
